Constructor Detail

TeddyServer

public TeddyServer()
Method Detail

getInstance

public static TeddyServer getInstance()

startServer

public void startServer()
Start the server. Refresh the server data regarding creation timestamp and discoverability in every case, even when the server is already running.

isRunning

protected boolean isRunning()
Check if the server is currently running. That is when getData() returns a non-null value.

Returns:
true if the server is running, else false.

stopServer

public void stopServer()
This function safely stops the server.

getPubKey

public java.lang.String getPubKey(java.lang.String pubKeyClient)
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.

Specified by:
getPubKey in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Parameters:
pubKeyClient - The key from the client so that the public key from the server can be encrypted.
Returns:
The public server key

send

public void send(NetworkMessage message)
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Send messages to the server. Depending on the type of the message, other clients are notified.

Specified by:
send in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Parameters:
message - Some NetworkMessage

join

public boolean join()
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Join a new client to the list of users.

Specified by:
join in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Returns:
Response from the server if the session could be opened or not.

disconnect

public void disconnect(java.lang.Integer client,
                       java.lang.String reason)
Call this function instead of disconnect(Integer) if you want to send a reason for disconnecting. This is, for example, if a client gets kicked.

Parameters:
client - Client ID
reason - Reason for the disconnect

disconnect

public void disconnect(java.lang.Integer client)
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Destroy the active session for the specified user.

Specified by:
disconnect in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI

getClientData

public ClientData getClientData(java.lang.Integer id)
Return the client data specified by the ID in the current server context. Note: Does not check if the entry exists!

Parameters:
id - Client id
Returns:
Client data, i. e. the name, health, ...

setClientData

public void setClientData(java.lang.Integer clientID,
                          ClientData client)
Adds client data to the current list. Existing data will be overwritten!
